track.name: Don't You Remember
comments: I feel really good that I can listen to this song today without hurting myself. It was the anthem of the darkest period of my life, and today it's just part of a memory. For all of you who relate to this song: it gets better :)
I feel that my shoulders tremble every time I listen to this song. Just amazing!
Like this tune. I don't know what makes it work 4me. Usually i don't care for whiny songs ...well this has a quality i Mean QQQuality!
Very soulful for a very young person. I suppose emotion knows no age. Great sound!
Beautiful singer<3  from my part of North London.
i miss me ex i wonder does he still remember are times 2gether bc i know that i do... i will never forget them he was my first he was my everything..
